original_title: Utta Danella - Der Sommer des glücklichen Narren
overview: Writer's block, divorce, financial shortage: The charming writer Paul Buchner has already experienced better summers. He decides that the topic of "women" is no longer of interest to him, and he retires to his mountain lodge. But with the quiet loneliness it is over quickly. As the handsome Steffi knocks on his door, it is suddenly more turbulent than he would like.
title: Utta Danella - Der Sommer des glücklichen Narren
